body_html:
This might be related to this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/torch-from-numpy-in-custom-backward-doesnt-work/9791/18

If it is the same issue, then building from source or upgrading to 0.3 when it comes out should fix the problem.
body_text:
This might be related to this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/torch-from-numpy-in-custom-backward-doesnt-work/9791/18
If it is the same issue, then building from source or upgrading to 0.3 when it comes out should fix the problem.
body:
This might be related to this: https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/torch-from-numpy-in-custom-backward-doesnt-work/9791/18

If it is the same issue, then building from source or upgrading to 0.3 when it comes out should fix the problem.
